entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then west 30 gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
